verses.roman:
tāṅra āge yadyapi saba līlāra bhāṇḍāra
tathāpi alpa varṇiyā chāḍilena āra

synonyms: tāṅra āge—before him; yadyapi—although; saba—all; līlāra—of the pastimes; bhāṇḍāra—full store; tathāpi—still; alpa—very little; varṇiyā—describing; chāḍilena—he left; āra—the others.
translation: Although Vṛndāvana dāsa Ṭhākura has within his jurisdiction the full store of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu's pastimes, he has left aside most of them and described but a small portion.
